name: Sudoku Classic Free
description:
Classic Sudoku.

Sudoku is a simple and addictive logical puzzle game. The goal of the game is fill entire grid so every row, column and 3x3 block contains unique numbers from 1 to 9. No math required, but you need some patience and logic.

Features:

- Large game field optimized for iPad screens
- Supports landscape and portrait orientations
- Random and unique puzzles
- One solution puzzles on all difficulty levels except Extreme
- Four difficulty levels available
- Great for beginners and Sudoku Masters

E-mail us your feedback! We really try to make a greatest Sudoku ever.
